PAD_DeathReaction.synopsis: Player has fought and defeated an infernal creature that was masqeurading as an ox.
PAD_DeathReaction.how_to_trigger: Fight and kill the infernal creature masquerading as an ox in the stables of the last light inn.

AD_WeaponSmithReactionToOx.synopsis: Dammon comments on the corpse of the devilish ox.
AD_WeaponSmithReactionToOx.how_to_trigger: Kill the devilish ox in Haven. After it dies, Dammon walks over to examine it, and comment on it.

PAD_SecondInsight.synopsis: The player walks past the stables outside the inn and can determine this is the same ox they saw in Druid's Grove if they pass an insight check
PAD_SecondInsight.how_to_trigger: When entering the Last Light Inn area, walk straight ahead to the stables. The devilish ox is in the first stable, with Toron stood outside it.

PAD_DeathReaction_0.speaker: Player
PAD_DeathReaction_0.text: Perhaps next time we shouldn't poke the mysterious ox.

PAD_DeathReaction_2.speaker: Player
PAD_DeathReaction_2.text: Perhaps. But that's certainly a fight I won't soon forget.

PAD_DeathReaction_1.speaker: Player
PAD_DeathReaction_1.text: I don't think I'll ever look at an ox quite the same.

AD_WeaponSmithReactionToOx_1.speaker: Dammon
AD_WeaponSmithReactionToOx_1.text: Just when I think I've seen it all...
AD_WeaponSmithReactionToOx_1.context: NodeContext: Staring at the dead ochre jelly that was once one of the oxen in the stable.

AD_WeaponSmithReactionToOx_0.speaker: Dammon
AD_WeaponSmithReactionToOx_0.context: NodeContext: Resigned acceptance. At leas tthis weird thing is dead, unlike all the other threats to our safety.

PAD_SecondInsight_0.speaker: Player
PAD_SecondInsight_0.text: Looks like that odd ox made it through the shadows.
